verses.text: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H1121"\w* astir \w with|strong="H5921"\w* beautiful words: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w sing|strong="H7892"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*, \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* tongue \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* pen \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ready writer.

\w Your|strong="H1697"\w* beauty \w is|strong="H3820"\w* more \w than|strong="H2896"\w* mortal, grace \w is|strong="H3820"\w* shed \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H1697"\w* lips: therefore God \w has|strong="H4428"\w* blessed \w you|strong="H3820"\w* forever.
Warrior, strap \w your|strong="H5921"\w* sword \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* thigh. \w What|strong="H3651"\w* glory \w and|strong="H1121"\w* splendor!

Good fortune attend \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w as|strong="H5921"\w* forth \w you|strong="H5921"\w* ride \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cause \w of|strong="H1368"\w* good faith, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w as|strong="H5921"\w* \w champion|strong="H1368"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* justice. \w May|strong="H2719"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* arm instruct \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* deeds \w of|strong="H1368"\w* dread.

Sharp \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* arrows; nations fall \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*: pierced \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* foes \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H5307"\w* throne \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* endure \w for|strong="H8478"\w* ever \w and|strong="H4428"\w* ever \w your|strong="H5307"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* sceptre \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H4428"\w* equity.

\w Right|strong="H4334"\w* \w you|strong="H5703"\w* love \w and|strong="H5769"\w* wrong \w you|strong="H5703"\w* hate: therefore \w the|strong="H7626"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w your|strong="H5769"\w* God anoints \w you|strong="H5703"\w* \w With|strong="H7626"\w* oil \w of|strong="H7626"\w* gladness above \w your|strong="H5769"\w* fellows.

\w With|strong="H5921"\w* myrrh, aloes, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* cassia \w your|strong="H5921"\w* robes \w are|strong="H2270"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* fragrant, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H2270"\w* gladdened \w by|strong="H5921"\w* music \w of|strong="H5921"\w* ivory harps.

King’s daughters stand ready \w with|strong="H3605"\w* jewels \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w at|strong="H1964"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* right hand \w the|strong="H3605"\w* queen \w in|strong="H8055"\w* gold \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Ophir.

Listen, \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* see; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* incline \w your|strong="H4428"\w* ear: forget \w your|strong="H4428"\w* folk \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H4428"\w* father’s house.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* king desires \w your|strong="H5186"\w* beauty, \w bow|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* lord.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Tyrians come \w with|strong="H4428"\w* gifts, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* richest \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w people|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* do \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w homage|strong="H7812"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* glorious altogether, \w with|strong="H6440"\w* dress \w of|strong="H1323"\w* pearls inwrought \w with|strong="H6440"\w* gold.

\w In|strong="H4428"\w* many-coloured \w robes|strong="H3830"\w* she \w is|strong="H3605"\w* led \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* virgin companions she \w brought|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* train.
\w The|strong="H1330"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s palace \w they|strong="H4428"\w* enter \w with|strong="H4428"\w* joy \w and|strong="H4428"\w* rejoicing.

\w May|strong="H4428"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4428"\w* yours take \w the|strong="H4428"\w* place \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H4428"\w* fathers, whom \w you|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* make princes \w in|strong="H4428"\w* all \w the|strong="H4428"\w* land.

\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* name \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* celebrate world \w without|strong="H1961"\w* end, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* nations \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* praise \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* ever \w and|strong="H1121"\w* ever.
